structure.unit: Chapter 17C METROPOLITAN DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF MOBILE HOMES AND REMOVAL OF DEBRIS FROM MOBILE HOME PARKS RENDERED UNINHABITABLE BY HURRICANE ANDREW AFTER ITS AFTERMATH

text.section:
Sec. 17C-8. Inspection of mobile home parks.
The Minimum Housing Enforcement Officer has the authority to inspect any mobile home park for the purpose of determining whether the same is uninhabitable.
